With Sellers in multiple countries listing their products for sale on the Amazon Marketplace, these Sellers are increasingly critical to delivering on Amazon’s vision of offering the Earth’s largest selection and lowest prices.  

  

This role will work with science and marketplace business teams to build advanced models to reduce end to end supply chain costs for FBA Sellers. You will build bridges to explain variance in inventory at granular levels to drive appropriate action within FBA product, marketplace business teams, and FBA Sellers. This is an analytical role which will require you to work closely with science and Machine Learning teams. * Analyze and interpret the structure of authoritative regulatory databases (e.g., Federal Register) and map them to our internal data model.
* Design and support the implementation of integration plans for ingesting content into the TDI Regulation Navigator.

* Assist in refining data models to accommodate varying document formats and metadata fields across jurisdictions.
* Collaborate with internal and offshore teams to monitor ingestion workflows and escalate issues related to data quality, coverage, or integration delays.
* Review and refine AI\-generated outputs to ensure relevance, compliance accuracy, and alignment with platform goals.

* **Teamwork:** You collaborate openly and respectfully, supporting team members to achieve shared goals on time and to high standards.

The ideal candidate for the **Regulatory Data Analyst** position will possess the following:


* **Education:** Bachelor's degree preferred in law, public policy, international relations, business, information science, or a related field.
* **Experience:** 2\+ years of experience in a relevant domain such as legal tech, regulatory research, compliance operations, data structuring, or API\-based content pipelines.

* Strong understanding of how regulatory content is published and structured by government entities, particularly in the US and EU.

* Enterprise Data Management
* Reinsurance Accounting and Reporting Operations/Technology

	+ System and vendor selection and implementation
	+ Definition of business and technical requirements
	+ Design of business and technology architecture
	+ Business intelligence/decision support
	+ Program/project management and implementation planning (PMO)

* Excellent written and verbal communication skills for technical writing and client presentations
* Ability to form relationships with business stakeholders and SMEs, and help them envision the future state and the change needed to facilitate it
* Ability to demonstrate strategic thinking through a proven ability to research client inquiries and emerging issues related to regulations, industry practice and new application technologies
* Travel to client site as necessary

* Experience with management reporting enhancement, business intelligence/decision support, data warehousing/enterprise data design and management, or enterprise application integration
* Experience with planning and facilitating user acceptance testing and managing associated business relationships
